2025-11-24.content:
**Preview**: TPU7x is available in Preview. TPU7x is the first release within
the Ironwood family, Google Cloud's seventh generation TPU. TPU7x supports
large-scale AI training and inference, providing performance and
cost-effectiveness for demanding workloads such as large language models (LLMs),
mixture of experts (MoEs), and diffusion models. For more information, see the
[TPU7x (Ironwood) documentation](https://docs.cloud.google.com/tpu/docs/tpu7x).

summary.title: TPU7x Now in Preview
summary.summary: TPU7x, the latest generation of Google's Tensor Processing Units, is now available in Preview. This new hardware is designed for large-scale AI training and inference, offering improved performance and cost-efficiency for demanding AI models like LLMs and diffusion models.
